title: Annual Fundraiser Gala
subtitle: Saturday, March 15th • 6:00 PM
description: Join us for an evening of celebration and giving as we support families in need. Dinner, silent auction, and inspirational stories included.

title: Food Pantry Volunteers Needed
subtitle: Wednesdays • 2-4 hours
description: Help sort and distribute food to families in our community. Perfect for individuals or groups.

title: Winter Coat Drive
subtitle: Now through February 28th
description: Collecting gently used winter coats for children and adults. Drop-off locations available throughout the city.

title: Maria's Story: From Crisis to Hope
subtitle: Community Impact
description: After losing her job, Maria found help through our food pantry and job training program. Today she's helping others in need.

title: Grace Community Church
subtitle: Partner Since 2015
description: Grace Community provides volunteers every week and hosts our monthly community meals. Thank you for your faithful partnership!

title: Financial Freedom Class
subtitle: Starting February 10th • 6 weeks
description: Learn budgeting, debt reduction, and financial planning in a supportive environment. Childcare provided.

title: Community Meal - Friday
subtitle: Every Friday • 5:30 PM
description: Free hot meal for anyone in need. All are welcome! No registration required.

title: Bicycle Donations Needed
subtitle: Drop-off: Main Office
description: We're collecting bicycles for families who need reliable transportation for work. Adult bikes especially needed.
